# PeopleRate Development Instructions

This is a FastAPI-based people review platform similar to TrustPilot but for individuals.

## Project Status
- [x] Project Structure Setup - Created FastAPI app with proper folder structure
- [x] Database Models - Pydantic models for User, Person, Review
- [x] Authentication System - JWT-based auth with bcrypt
- [x] API Endpoints - REST endpoints for core functionality
- [x] Database Connection - MongoDB with Motor async driver
- [x] Basic Frontend - HTML templates for MVP
- [x] Testing and Documentation - Tests and setup docs

## Tech Stack
- Backend: FastAPI (Python)
- Database: MongoDB
- Authentication: JWT + bcrypt
- Frontend: HTML/CSS/JS (MVP)
- Development: Local environment
